translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter about the One who Gave a Leaf
I was a demon, and at that time
To Vipassī, the Lord of men,
who was concerned for the welfare of the whole world,
to the one who was the best of men.
I did not go to a bad rebirth,
this was the result of worshipping the Buddha.
… the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”🔽Thus the Elder Ekapupphiya spoke these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā ekapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Ekapupphiyattherassāpadānaṁ catutthaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai ekapupphiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽ekapupphiya therassa apadānam catuttha
